title: Task 4.1.1 — Object Property Identity Panel
body:
Implements the core identity panel for object properties.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 4.1.1.1 Render property label
- [ ] 4.1.1.2 Render canonical IRI
- [ ] 4.1.1.3 Render ontology prefix
- [ ] 4.1.1.4 Render property type indicators
milestone: Phase 4 – Property Documentation, UX Enhancements & Accessibility

title: Task 4.1.2 — Domain & Range Panels
body:
Renders property domain and range panels.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 4.1.2.1 Render domain class links
- [ ] 4.1.2.2 Render range class links
- [ ] 4.1.2.3 Support multi-domain and multi-range
milestone: Phase 4 – Property Documentation, UX Enhancements & Accessibility

body:
